## NotificationMessageOptions interface

Options for notification message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clickToClose](./notifications.notificationmessageoptions.clicktoclose.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether is message closed by clicking on it |
